EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Pivotal@NYSE_Q413.NYSE Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Pivotal - NYSE Event Oct 28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're Looking Forward to You Joining Us.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Your registration is confirmed for the Pivotal NYSE event! We're happy you will be joining us for this exclusive event where we will be uniting to drive innovation and productivity in the world of Hadoop and Big Data.
Event Details:
Date: Monday, October 28, 2013
Time: 6-9pm
Location: NYSE Euronext, 11 Wall Street, New York, NY 10005 <https://maps.google.com/maps?q=The+New+York+Stock+Exchange&fb=1&gl=us&hq=NYSE+Euronext+11+Wall+Street+New+York,+NY+10005&cid=0,0,11409755124894101533&t=m&z=16&iwloc=A>
Questions? Contact Us <mailto:info@gopivotal.com>.
Please Note the NYSE Directions and Security Procedures for Guests:
- Guests should arrive at the 2 Broad Street entrance (external security checkpoint located at the corner of Wall and Broad Streets.) - All guests are required to show government issued photo ID (i.e. valid driver’s license or passport) and go through an airport-like security system upon entering the Exchange. - Public transportation is recommended. Subway: 2/3 to Wall St.; 4/5 to Wall St./Broadway; J/Z to Broad St./Wall St., R/W to Rector St.
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
